trans-unit.source: Testing cookbooks improves the quality of those cookbooks by ensuring they are doing what they are supposed to do and that they are authored in a consistent manner. Unit and integration testing validates the recipes in cookbooks. Syntax testing—often called linting—validates the quality of the code itself. The following tools are popular tools used for testing Chef recipes: Kitchen, ChefSpec, and Foodcritic.

trans-unit.source: That artifact regularly reports its compliance state, so you can proactively and continuously address compliance changes, instead of waiting for an audit. With a codified compliance baseline in place, you can address it earlier in the software development lifecycle. Placing compliance at the front of the delivery pipeline promotes good operational hygiene.

trans-unit.source: That is the magic of use_inline_resources (and why use_inline_resources is turned on by default in Chef Client 12.5 resources) The sub-resources are defined in a sub-resource collection which is compiled and converged as part of the provider executing. Any resources that update in the sub-resource collection cause the resource itself to be updated automatically. Notifications then fire normally off the resource. It also works to arbitrary levels of nesting of sub-sub-sub-resources being updating causing the wrapping resources to update and fire notifications.
trans-unit.target: 这就是 use_inline_resources 的魔力（以及为什么在Chef Client 12.5资源中默认情况下会 use_inline_resources ）子资源在子资源集合中定义，该子资源集合在提供程序执行过程中进行了编译和收敛。子资源集合中任何更新的资源都会导致资源本身自动更新。然后，通知通常会从资源中触发。它还可以在正在更新的子-子-子资源的任意嵌套级别上工作，从而导致包装资源进行更新并触发通知。

trans-unit.source: The delete-backups command is used to delete Chef Automate backup archives and Elasticsearch snapshots. The command matches a given regular expression and prompts the user to confirm deletion of each matched backup or snapshot. It can also be passed maximum archive and snapshot limits and prune the backup repositories to conform to those limits.
trans-unit.target: 该删除的备份命令用来删除厨师自动化备份存档Elasticsearch快照。该命令匹配给定的正则表达式，并提示用户确认删除每个匹配的备份或快照。还可以传递最大存档和快照限制，并修剪备份存储库以符合这些限制。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Studio provides a clean room build environment for your application build. In effect, builds that occur on a developer’s workstation, or on a continuous integration server, will build in the same manner. Developers no longer need to worry about entire classes of “it works on my box” problems. Build engineers no longer need to create unique and difficult to maintain worker nodes for continuous integration servers. Instead, the Chef Habitat plan.sh file contains all the information needed to build the entire application, from dependency management, runtime environment binaries, packaging, and application lifecycle hooks. When using the Chef Habitat Studio, your continuous integration server can focus more on what it is good at doing, instead of worrying about managing custom plugins and their potential conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 该厨师居工作室为您的应用程序构建一个洁净室构建环境。实际上，在开发人员的工作站或持续集成服务器上进行的构建将以相同的方式进行构建。开发人员不再需要担心整个类别的“它可以在我的盒子上工作”的问题。建筑工程师不再需要为连续集成服务器创建唯一且难以维护的工作节点。相反，Chef Habitat plan.sh文件包含构建整个应用程序所需的所有信息，这些信息来自于依赖性管理，运行时环境二进制文件，打包和应用程序生命周期挂钩。使用Chef Habitat Studio时，您的持续集成服务器可以将更多的精力放在其擅长的工作上，而不用担心管理自定义插件及其潜在冲突。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Chef Provider allows you to manage Chef Infra Server resources (nodes, data bags, etc.) using the Chef Infra Server API. Policyfiles, cookbooks, clients, and ACLs are not currently managed with the Provider. The Terraform Chef Provider documentation provides a complete list of supported options and an example of usage. HashiCorp provides support for the Terraform Chef Provider and it is not officially supported by Chef Software.
trans-unit.target: 该Terraform厨师提供商允许你管理使用厨师红外服务器API厨师红外服务器资源（节点，数据包等）。当前未通过提供程序管理策略文件，食谱，客户端和ACL。该Terraform厨师提供的文件提供了支持的选项的完整列表和使用情况的一个例子。 HashiCorp为Terraform Chef Provider提供支持，Chef Software并未正式支持它。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Chef Provisioner bootstraps Terraform, provisioned with Chef Infra via SSH or WinRM, and configures them to work with a Chef Infra Server. Standard bootstrap options such as Chef Infra versions, secrets, proxies, and assigning run lists via Policyfiles or Roles and Environments are all supported. The referenced documentation provides a complete list of supported options and an example of usage. HashiCorp provides support for the Terraform Chef Provisioner and it is not officially supported by Chef Software.
trans-unit.target: 该Terraform厨师置备白手起家Terraform，通过SSH或WinRM的大厨红外线供应，并配置要工作，一个厨师红外服务器。支持所有标准引导程序选项，例如Chef Infra版本，机密信息，代理以及通过Policyfiles或Roles and Environments分配运行列表。参考文档提供了支持的选项的完整列表以及用法示例。HashiCorp为Terraform Chef Provisioner提供支持，Chef Software并未正式支持它。

trans-unit.source: The <PACKAGE_IDENTIFIER> invocation mixes Supervisor-specific and service-specific options, it can sometimes be difficult to reason about, depending on how complex your usecase is. As a result, that form should be limited to constrained container-based usecases, and perhaps local simple testing or evaluation scenarios. Additionally, since a Supervisor has state – the services it is manages – you may end up starting additional services, depending on what you’ve done in the past on the same machine. That is, hab sup run <PACKAGE_IDENTIFIER> is not, in general, synonymous with “only run this single service”.
trans-unit.target: 该 <PACKAGE_IDENTIFIER> 调用混合监事特定和服务特定的选项，它有时是困难的原因有关，这取决于你的用例的复杂程度。因此，该表格应仅限于受约束的基于容器的用例，以及可能仅限于本地的简单测试或评估方案。此外，由于主管具有状态（即所管理的服务），因此您可能最终会启动其他服务，具体取决于您过去在同一台计算机上所做的工作。也就是说， hab sup run <PACKAGE_IDENTIFIER> 通常不是“仅运行此单个服务”的同义词。

(The -S search query option with the knife vault create subcommand does the same.)

trans-unit.source: The .bldr.toml file is in TOML format, so create a TOML table specifying the $pkg_name value for that plan and then add a plan_path field specifying the path to your plan.sh file (you do not need to include plan.sh explicitly in the path). If all the files related to the plan are under the plan path, then you are done. Otherwise, you will need an additional ‘paths’ field specifying Unix-style path globs to files that are associated with the plan you specified in the ‘plan_path’. File or directory changes made in these path locations determine which packages will be rebuilt. Basically, when a file is committed, Builder will check to see whether it falls underneath the plan_path hierarchy, or matches one of the globs in the paths field if it was specified - if the answer is yes, then Builder will issue a build for that commit.
trans-unit.target: 该 .bldr.toml 文件是TOML格式，因此创建一个TOML表指定 $pkg_name 为计划值，然后添加一个 plan_path 字段中指定的路径，你 plan.sh 文件（你不需要包括plan.sh明确在路径中）。如果与计划相关的所有文件都在计划路径下，则操作完成。否则，您将需要一个额外的“路径”字段，用于指定与您在“ plan_path”中指定的计划相关联的文件的Unix样式的路径glob。在这些路径位置进行的文件或目录更改决定了将重建哪些软件包。基本上，提交文件后，Builder会检查它是否在 plan_path 下层次结构，或者匹配 paths 字段中的glob之一（如果已指定的话）-如果答案是肯定的，那么Builder将为此提交发布一个构建。

trans-unit.source: The /updated_since endpoint ensures that replica instances of the Chef Infra Server are able to synchronize with the primary Chef Infra Server. /updated_since was part of the Chef Replication product. trans-unit.source: The Chef::Platform class maps providers to platforms (and platform versions). At the beginning of every chef-client run, Ohai verifies the platform and platform_version attributes on each node. The chef-client then uses those values to identify the correct provider, build an instance of that provider, identify the current state of the resource, do the specified action, and then mark the resource as updated (if changes were made).
trans-unit.target: 该 Chef::Platform 类映射供应商平台（和平台的版本）。在每次厨师客户端运行开始时，Ohai都会验证每个节点上的 platform 和 platform_version 属性。然后，chef-client使用这些值来识别正确的提供者，构建该提供者的实例，识别资源的当前状态，执行指定的操作，然后将资源标记为已更新（如果进行了更改）。

trans-unit.source: The GET method is used to return a data structure that contains a link to each available environment.
trans-unit.target: 的 GET 方法用来返回包含链接到每个可用的环境的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: The GET method is used to return a data structure that contains links to each available search index. By default, the role, node, client, and data bag indexes will always be available (where the data bag index is the name of the data bag on the Chef Infra Server). Search indexes may lag behind the most current data at any given time. If a situation occurs where data needs to be written and then immediately searched, an artificial delay (of at least 10 seconds) is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 的 GET 方法用来返回包含链接到每个可用的搜索索引的数据结构。默认情况下， role ， node ， client 和 data bag 索引将始终可用（其中 data bag index是Chef Infra Server上数据包的名称）。在任何给定时间，搜索索引都可能落后于最新数据。如果出现需要先写入数据然后立即进行搜索的情况，则建议人为延迟（至少10秒）。

If a situation occurs where data needs to be written and then immediately searched, an artificial delay (of at least 10 seconds) is recommended.

trans-unit.source: The Resource.provider_base allows the developer to specify an alternative module to load providers from, rather than Chef::Provider. trans-unit.source: The analytics_fqdn setting must be added to the opscode-analytics.rb file (it is not there by default). Its value should be equal to the FQDN or IP address for the service URI used by the Chef Analytics server. For example: analytics_fqdn "chef-analytics.example.com" or analytics_fqdn 123.45.67.890.
trans-unit.target: 该 analytics_fqdn 设置必须添加到Opscode公司-analytics.rb文件（它不存在默认情况下）。其值应等于Chef Analytics Server使用的服务URI的FQDN或IP地址。例如： analytics_fqdn "chef-analytics.example.com" 或 analytics_fqdn 123.45.67.890 。

trans-unit.source: The api_fqdn setting can be added to the private-chef.rb file (it is not there by default). When added, its value should be equal to the FQDN or IP address for the service URI used by the Chef Infra Server. Then configure the same value for the bookshelf['vip'] setting prior to installing the Chef Infra Server. For example: api_fqdn "chef.example.com" or api_fqdn 123.45.67.890.
trans-unit.target: 该 api_fqdn 设置可以加入到私人chef.rb文件（它不存在默认情况下）。添加后，其值应等于Chef Infra Server使用的服务URI的FQDN或IP地址。然后，在安装Chef Infra Server之前，为 bookshelf['vip'] 设置配置相同的值。例如： api_fqdn "chef.example.com" 或 api_fqdn 123.45.67.890 。

trans-unit.source: The api_fqdn setting can be added to the private-chef.rb file (it is not there by default). When added, its value should be equal to the FQDN or IP address for the service URI used by the Chef server. Then configure the same value for the bookshelf['vip'] setting prior to installing the Chef server. For example: api_fqdn "chef.example.com" or api_fqdn 123.45.67.890.
trans-unit.target: 该 api_fqdn 设置可以加入到私人chef.rb文件（它不存在默认情况下）。添加后，其值应等于Chef服务器使用的服务URI的FQDN或IP地址。然后，在安装Chef服务器之前，为 bookshelf['vip'] 设置配置相同的值。例如： api_fqdn "chef.example.com" 或 api_fqdn 123.45.67.890 。

trans-unit.source: The architectures matcher tests the architecture of packages installed on the system

trans-unit.source: The audit cookbook supports several different methods of fetching and reporting compliance information.
trans-unit.target: 该 audit 食谱支持获取和报告合规性信息的几种不同的方法。

trans-unit.source: The audit cookbook uses the Chef InSpec gem. It will check for an installed version of Chef InSpec and install it upon finding none. The latest version of Chef InSpec will be installed by default unless otherwise specified with node['audit']['inspec_version'].
trans-unit.target: 该 audit 食谱采用厨师INSPEC宝石。它将检查Chef InSpec的安装版本，并在找不到该版本时进行安装。除非使用 node['audit']['inspec_version'] 另行指定，否则默认情况下将默认安装Chef InSpec的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: The be_setgid matcher tests if the ‘setgid’ permission is set on the file or directory. On executable files, this causes the process to be started owned by the group that owns the file, rather than the primary group of the invocating user. This can result in escalation of privilege. On Linux, when setgid is set on directories, setgid causes newly created files and directories to be owned by the group that owns the setgid parent directory; additionally, newly created subdirectories will have the setgid bit set. To use this matcher:
trans-unit.target: 该 be_setgid 匹配测试，如果“setgid的”权限设置上的文件或目录。在可执行文件上，这将导致该进程由拥有该文件的组（而不是进行调用的用户的主要组）开始拥有。这可能会导致特权升级。在Linux上，在目录上设置setgid时，setgid导致新创建的文件和目录由拥有setgid父目录的组拥有；此外，新创建的子目录将设置setgid位。要使用此匹配器：

trans-unit.source: The be_setuid matcher tests if the ‘setuid’ permission is set on the file. On executable files, this causes the process to be started owned by the user that owns the file, rather than invocating user. This can result in escalation of privilege. To use this matcher:
trans-unit.target: 该 be_setuid 匹配测试，如果“setuid的”权限设置上的文件。在可执行文件上，这将使进程由拥有文件的用户（而不是邀请用户）开始拥有。这可能会导致特权升级。要使用此匹配器：

trans-unit.source: The checksum attribute will ask Chef Infra Client to compare the checksum for the local file to the one at the remote location. trans-unit.source: The chef gem subcommand is a wrapper around the gem command in RubyGems and is used by Chef to install RubyGems into Chef Workstation development environment. All knife plugins, drivers for Kitchen, and other Ruby applications that are not packaged within Chef Workstation will be installed to the .Chef Workstation path in the home directory: ~/.Chef Workstation/gem/ruby/ver.si.on/bin (where ver.si.on is the version of Ruby that is packaged within Chef Workstation).
trans-unit.target: chef gem 子命令是RubyGems中 gem 命令的包装，Chef使用该子命令将RubyGems安装到Chef Workstation开发环境中。未在Chef Workstation中打包的所有刀插件，Kitchen的驱动程序和其他Ruby应用程序都将安装到主目录中的 .Chef Workstation 路径： ~/.Chef Workstation/gem/ruby/ver.si.on/bin （其中 ver.si.on 是Chef Workstation中打包的Ruby版本）。

trans-unit.source: The chef push-archive subcommand is used to publish a policy archive file to the Chef Infra Server. (A policy archive is created using the chef export subcommand.) The policy archive is assigned to the specified policy group, which is a set of nodes that share the same run-list and cookbooks.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef push-archive 子命令发布政策归档文件的厨师红外服务器。（使用 chef export 子命令创建策略存档。）将策略存档分配给指定的策略组，该策略组是共享相同运行列表和食谱的一组节点。

trans-unit.target: 该 chef report cookbooks -p PROFILE 命令将：

trans-unit.source: The chef-automate init-config command generates an annotated Chef Automate configuration file with the basic settings needed to deploy Chef Automate. This section describes those settings and how to change them on an existing Chef Automate installation.
trans-unit.target: 的 chef-automate init-config 命令生成与部署厨师自动化所需的基本设置的注释的厨师自动化配置文件。本节介绍了这些设置以及如何在现有的Chef Automate安装中进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The chef-automate CLI emits this error when the CLI is unable to communicate with a Chef Automate deployment. In particular, when Chef Automate 2 (as distinct from Chef Automate 1) is not deployed, running chef-automate CLI commands such as version or status causes this error.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef-automate 当CLI无法与厨师自动部署沟通CLI发出此错误。特别是，当没有部署Chef Automate 2（与Chef Automate 1不同）时，运行 chef-automate CLI命令（例如 version 或 status 会导致此错误。

trans-unit.source: The chef-automate CLI provides commands to help you work with your existing Chef Automate configuration:
trans-unit.target: 该 chef-automate CLI提供给您与您现有的厨师自动化配置工作帮助命令：

trans-unit.source: The chef-backend-ctl gen-server-config command, which can be run as root from any node in the backend cluster, will automatically generate a configuration file containing the superuser database access credentials for the backend cluster PostgreSQL instance.
trans-unit.target: 的 chef-backend-ctl gen-server-config 命令，该命令可以从后端群集中的任何节点上运行作为根，将自动生成包含针对后端簇PostgreSQL实例超级用户数据库访问凭证的配置文件。

trans-unit.target: 该 chef-backend-ctl status 子命令用于检查正在运行的服务的状态厨师后端服务器拓扑。此命令将在其运行的节点上验证以下服务的状态：

trans-unit.source: The chef-full distribution uses the omnibus installer. For most bootstrap operations, regardless of the platform on which the target node is running, using the chef-full distribution is the best approach for installing the chef-client on a target node. In some situations, using another supported distribution is necessary. And in some situations, a custom template may be required.
trans-unit.target: chef-full 的厨师分发版使用omnibus安装程序。对于大多数引导操作，无论目标节点运行在哪个平台上，使用 chef-full 分发是在目标节点上安装chef-client的最佳方法。在某些情况下，必须使用另一个受支持的发行版。在某些情况下，可能需要自定义模板。

trans-unit.source: The chef-run utility allows you to execute ad-hoc configuration updates on the systems you manage without setting up a Chef server. With chef-run, you connect to servers over SSH or WinRM, and you can apply single resources, recipes, or even entire cookbooks directly from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef-run 实用程序，可以执行特定配置更新您所管理，而无需设置厨师服务器系统。使用 chef-run ，您可以通过SSH或WinRM连接到服务器，并且可以直接从命令行应用单个资源，配方甚至整个食谱。

trans-unit.source: The chef-server-ctl install command no longer works in the 12.5 (and earlier) versions of the Chef Infra Server due to a change in how packages are downloaded from Chef.
trans-unit.target: 由于更改了从Chef下载软件包的方式， chef-server-ctl install 命令在Chef Infra Server的12.5（或更早版本）中不再起作用。

trans-unit.source: The chef-server-ctl install command no longer works in the 12.5 (and earlier) versions of the Chef server due to a change in how packages are downloaded from Chef.
trans-unit.target: 由于更改了从Chef下载软件包的方式， chef-server-ctl install 命令在Chef Server的12.5（或更早版本）中不再起作用。

trans-unit.source: The chef-server-ctl command will install the first chef-manage package found in the /root/packages directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef-server-ctl 命令将安装第一个 chef-manage 包中的发现 /root/packages 目录。

trans-unit.source: The chef-vault gem can be used as a stand-alone binary to decrypt values stored in Chef. It requires that Chef is installed on the system and that you have a valid config.rb. This is useful if you want to mix Chef Vault into non-Chef recipe code, for example some other script where you want to protect a password.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef-vault 的宝石可以作为一个独立的二进制文件存储在大厨解密值。它要求在系统上安装Chef，并且您具有有效的 config.rb 。如果要将Chef Vault混合到非Chef配方代码中（例如，您想在其中保护密码的其他脚本），则此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The chef-web-docs repo contains a content directory which holds most the Markdown files in the doc set.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef-web-docs 回购包含 content ，其持有该文档集的大部分降价文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The chef_gem resource used to execute at compile time by default, but now we recommend that users move code that executes at compile time to custom resources.
trans-unit.target: 该 chef_gem 资源在使用默认的编译时间来执行，但现在我们建议用户移动代码在编译时自定义资源来实现的。

trans-unit.source: The cleanse subcommand is used to re-set a machine in the Chef Infra Server backend HA cluster to the state it was in prior to the first time the reconfigure subcommand is run. This command will destroy all data, configuration files, and logs. The software that was put on-disk by the package installation will remain; re-run chef-backend-ctl reconfigure to recreate the default data and configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 在 cleanse 子命令用于复置一台机器的厨师红外服务器后端HA群集到其在之前的第一时间的状态下 reconfigure 子命令运行。此命令将销毁所有数据，配置文件和日志。软件包安装过程中放到磁盘上的软件将保留；重新运行 chef-backend-ctl reconfigure 以重新创建默认数据和配置文件。

trans-unit.target: 该 cleanse 子命令用于重新设置厨师自动化服务器它是在之前的第一次状态 reconfigure 子命令运行。该命令将：

trans-unit.source: The cleanse subcommand is used to re-set the Chef Infra Server to the state it was in prior to the first time the reconfigure subcommand is run. This command will destroy all data, configuration files, and logs. The software that was put on-disk by the package installation will remain; re-run chef-server-ctl reconfigure to recreate the default data and configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 该 cleanse 子命令用于重新设置厨师红外服务器到它在之前的第一次状态 reconfigure 子命令运行。此命令将销毁所有数据，配置文件和日志。软件包安装过程中放到磁盘上的软件将保留；重新运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 以重新创建默认数据和配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The cleanse subcommand is used to re-set the Chef management console to the state it was in prior to the first time the reconfigure subcommand is run. This command will destroy all data, configuration files, and logs. The software that was put on-disk by the package installation will remain; re-run chef-manage-ctl reconfigure to recreate the default data and configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 该 cleanse 子命令用于重新设置厨师管理控制台来它是在之前的第一次状态 reconfigure 子命令运行。此命令将销毁所有数据，配置文件和日志。软件包安装过程中放到磁盘上的软件将保留；重新运行 chef-manage-ctl reconfigure 以重新创建默认数据和配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The cleanse subcommand is used to re-set the Chef server to the state it was in prior to the first time the reconfigure subcommand is run. This command will destroy all data, configuration files, and logs. The software that was put on-disk by the package installation will remain; re-run chef-server-ctl reconfigure to recreate the default data and configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 该 cleanse 子命令用于重新设置厨师服务器它是在之前的第一次状态 reconfigure 子命令运行。此命令将销毁所有数据，配置文件和日志。软件包安装过程中放在磁盘上的软件将保留；重新运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 以重新创建默认数据和配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The cleanse subcommand is used to re-set the server to the state it was in before the first time the reconfigure subcommand is run to destroy all data, configuration files, and logs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cleanse 子命令用于重新设置服务器，以它在第一次之前的状态 reconfigure 子命令运行到销毁所有数据，配置文件和日志。

trans-unit.source: The cleanup-bifrost subcommand removes unused authorization objects from the authorization database (called bifrost). These unused objects can accumulate on long-running Chef servers as a result of failed object creation requests. For most users, the unused authorization objects do not substantially affect the performance of Chef Infra Server; however in certain situations it can be helpful to clean them up. This command is primarily intended for use by Chef support.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cleanup-bifrost 子命令将删除授权数据库（称为bifrost）未使用的授权对象。由于对象创建请求失败，这些未使用的对象会累积在长时间运行的Chef服务器上。对于大多数用户而言，未使用的授权对象基本上不会影响Chef Infra Server的性能。但是，在某些情况下，清理它们可能会有所帮助。该命令主要供Chef支持人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The client.pem file is incorrect. This can be fixed by deleting the client.pem file and re-running Chef Infra Client. When Chef Infra Client re-runs, it will re-attempt to register with the Chef Infra Server and generate the correct key.
trans-unit.target: 该 client.pem 文件不正确。可以通过删除 client.pem 文件并重新运行Chef Infra Client来解决此问题。当Chef Infra Client重新运行时，它将重新尝试在Chef Infra Server中注册并生成正确的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The client.pem file is incorrect. This can be fixed by deleting the client.pem file and re-running the chef-client. When the chef-client re-runs, it will re-attempt to register with the Chef server and generate the correct key.
trans-unit.target: 该 client.pem 文件不正确。可以通过删除 client.pem 文件并重新运行Chef-client来解决此问题。当Chef-client重新运行时，它将重新尝试在Chef服务器中注册并生成正确的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The clients group defines the list of nodes on which a Chef Infra Client is installed and under management by Chef. In general, think of this permission as "all of the non-human actors---Chef Infra Client, in nearly every case---that get data from, and/or upload data to, the Chef server". Newly-created Chef Infra Client instances are added to this group automatically.
trans-unit.target: 该 clients 群定义在其上安装了红外线厨师客户端和厨师管理的节点列表。通常，将此许可视为“所有非人类参与者-在几乎每种情况下-Chef Infra Client-从Chef服务器获取数据和/或将数据上传到Chef服务器”。新创建的Chef Infra Client实例会自动添加到该组中。

trans-unit.source: The clients group defines the list of nodes on which a chef-client is installed and under management by Chef. In general, think of this permission as “all of the non-human actors—the chef-client, in nearly every case—that get data from, and/or upload data to, the Chef server”. Newly-created chef-client instances are added to this group automatically.
trans-unit.target: 该 clients 群定义在其上安装一个厨师的客户端和厨师管理的节点列表。通常，将此许可视为“所有非人类参与者-在几乎每种情况下，都是从Chef服务器获取数据和/或将数据上传到Chef服务器的Chef-Client”。新创建的Chef-Client实例将自动添加到该组中。

trans-unit.source: The clients group is assigned the following:
trans-unit.target: 为 clients 组分配了以下内容：

trans-unit.source: The cmp matcher compares values across types.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmp 匹配跨类型的比较值。

trans-unit.source: The cmp matcher handles type conversions, case insensitive comparisons, converting strings to versions (e.g. ‘7.35.0-1ubuntu2.10’), and many other troublesome things. Unless you want an exact match (if so use the eq matcher) then the cmp matcher should be used.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmp 匹配手柄类型转换，不区分大小写的比较，将字符串转换为版本（例如“7.35.0-1ubuntu2.10”），以及其他许多麻烦的事情。除非您要精确匹配（如果要使用 eq 匹配器），则应使用 cmp 匹配器。

trans-unit.source: The code_generator cookbook itself is not specified as part of the path.
trans-unit.target: 未将 code_generator 食谱本身指定为路径的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The collect_data method is a block of Ruby code that is called by Ohai when it runs. One (or more) collect_data blocks can be defined in a plugin, but only a single collect_data block is ever run. The collect_data block that is run is determined by the platform on which the node is running, which is then matched up against the available collect_data blocks in the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该 collect_data 方法是Ruby代码块由Ohai在运行时调用。可以在一个插件中定义一个（或多个） collect_data 块，但是只运行一个 collect_data 块。运行的 collect_data 块由运行该节点的平台确定，然后将其与插件中可用的 collect_data 块进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: The command entry for the National Parks Tomcat application allows the Chef Habitat Supervisor to --peer to the mongo gossip ring and --bind applies database entries to its Mongo configuration.
trans-unit.target: 国家公园Tomcat应用程序的 command 条目使Chef Habitat Supervisor可以 --peer 到 mongo 八卦环，并且 --bind 将 database 条目应用于其Mongo配置。

trans-unit.source: The concat helper can be used to connect multiple strings into one string without a separator. For example, {{strConcat "foo" "bar" "baz"}} would return "foobarbaz".\
trans-unit.target: 所述 concat 辅助可用于多个字符串连接成一个字符串不包含隔板。例如， {{strConcat "foo" "bar" "baz"}} 将返回 "foobarbaz" 。\

trans-unit.source: The config.json file is located at the root of the .delivery folder that is located within a project managed by Workflow and configures that project to publish to a pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 该 config.json 文件位于根 .delivery 位于由工作流并配置管理的一个项目，项目发布到管道内的文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: The config.rb file is a replacement for the knife.rb file, starting with the Chef Client 12.0 release. The config.rb file has identical settings and behavior to the knife.rb file. Chef Infra Client looks first for the presence of the config.rb file and if it is not found, then looks for the knife.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 该 config.rb 文件是knife.rb文件的替换，从厨师客户12.0版本。该 config.rb 文件具有相同的设置和行为的knife.rb文件。Chef Infra Client首先寻找 config.rb 文件的存在，如果找不到，则寻找 knife.rb 文件。

trans-unit.target: 该 config.toml 告诉雨果如何建立导航菜单，包含其他雨果设置。不要修改此文件。

trans-unit.source: The config.yml is the interface to the remediation system. You will express all of your policy customizations in the config.yml. You can find the content of failed compliance scans in Chef Automate. Copy the controls for customization from the Chef Automate Compliance > Reporting results into the config.yml.
trans-unit.target: 该 config.yml 是界面的修复系统。您将在 config.yml 中表达所有策略自定义。您可以在Chef Automate中找到失败的合规性扫描内容。将用于自定义的控件从Chef Automate Compliance> Reporting结果复制到 config.yml 中。

trans-unit.target: 该 converge_if_changed 方法可以使用多次。下面的示例演示如何使用 converge_if_changed 方法将多个所需属性值与当前属性值（由 load_current_value 方法加载）进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The cookbook keyword allows the user to define where a cookbook is installed from, or to set additional version constraints. It can also be used to install additional cookbooks, for example to use during testing.
trans-unit.target: 的 cookbook 关键字允许用户定义其中食谱从设置，或设置另外的版本的约束。它还可以用于安装其他食谱，例如在测试过程中使用。

trans-unit.source: The cookbooks/ directory is used to store the cookbooks that Chef Infra Client uses when configuring the various systems in the organization. This directory contains the cookbooks that are used to configure systems in the infrastructure. Each cookbook can be configured to contain cookbook-specific copyright, email, and license data.
trans-unit.target: 该 cookbooks/ 目录用来存放食谱是厨师红外客户端配置在组织中的各个系统时使用。该目录包含用于在基础架构中配置系统的食谱。可以将每个食谱配置为包含特定于食谱的版权，电子邮件和许可证数据。

trans-unit.source: The cookbooks/ directory is used to store the cookbooks that are used by the chef-client when configuring the various systems in the organization. This directory contains the cookbooks that are used to configure systems in the infrastructure. Each cookbook can be configured to contain cookbook-specific copyright, email, and license data.
trans-unit.target: 该 cookbooks/ 目录用于存储由厨师客户端配置在组织中的各个系统时使用的食谱。该目录包含用于在基础架构中配置系统的食谱。可以将每个食谱配置为包含特定于食谱的版权，电子邮件和许可证数据。

trans-unit.source: The cookbooks/ directory of your Chef Infra repository is used to store the cookbooks that Chef Infra Client uses in configuring the various systems in the organization.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra存储库的 cookbooks/ 目录用于存储Chef Infra Client在配置组织中的各种系统时使用的食谱。

trans-unit.source: The cookbooks/[NAME] endpoint allows a specific cookbook to be accessed. This endpoint has the following methods: DELETE and GET.
trans-unit.target: 通过 cookbooks/[NAME] 端点，可以访问特定的Cookbook。该端点具有以下方法： DELETE 和 GET 。

trans-unit.source: The count property returns an Integer describing how many interfaces matched.
trans-unit.target: 该 count 属性返回一个整数描述了许多接口如何匹配。

trans-unit.source: The count property tests the number of records that the filter matched.
trans-unit.target: 该 count 性能测试中，过滤器匹配的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The create-backup subcommand is used to create Chef Automate backups. By default, it creates Automate backup archives and Elasticsearch snapshots.
trans-unit.target: 在 create-backup 子命令用于创建厨师自动执行备份。默认情况下，它将创建自动备份存档和Elasticsearch快照。

trans-unit.source: The create-enterprise subcommand is used to create a Chef Automate enterprise. A public key is required.
trans-unit.target: 在 create-enterprise 子命令用于创建一个厨师自动化企业。需要公用密钥。

trans-unit.source: The create-user subcommand is used to create a user. (The validation key for the organization may be returned to STDOUT when creating a user with this command.)
trans-unit.target: 在 create-user 子命令用于创建一个用户。（使用此命令创建用户时，组织的验证密钥可能会返回到 STDOUT 。）

trans-unit.source: The create-users subcommand is used to create one or more users from a TSV file.
trans-unit.target: 在 create-users 子命令用于从TSV文件中创建一个或多个用户。

trans-unit.source: The create_dirs_before_symlink property is empty, which is different from the default
trans-unit.target: 该 create_dirs_before_symlink 属性是空的，这是不同于默认

trans-unit.target: 在 data-lifecycle API允许配置和数据类型的运行生命周期作业：

trans-unit.source: The data-summary subcommand is used to get the summary of Chef Automate’s data store. The default setting for data-summary is to display the complete data summary of the Chef Automate Elasticsearch cluster which includes the cluster, converge, compliance and node state information. You may optionally pass one or many flags to limit the output to specific data groupings.
trans-unit.target: 该 data-summary 子命令是用来获取厨师自动化的数据存储的摘要。 data-summary 的默认设置是显示Chef Automate Elasticsearch群集的完整数据摘要，其中包括群集，收敛，合规性和节点状态信息。您可以选择传递一个或多个标志，以将输出限制为特定的数据分组。

trans-unit.source: The data_bag method returns an array with a key for each of the data bag items that are found in the data bag.
trans-unit.target: 该 data_bag 方法返回与为每个在数据包中找到的数据包的项目的键阵列。

trans-unit.source: The data_bag_item method can be used in a recipe to get the contents of a data bag item.
trans-unit.target: 该 data_bag_item 方法可以在配方中使用获得的数据包项的内容。

trans-unit.source: The data_bags/ directory is used to store all of the data bags that exist for an organization. Each sub-directory corresponds to a single data bag on the Chef Infra Server and contains a JSON file for each data bag item. If a sub-directory does not exist, then create it using SSL commands. After a data bag item is created, it can then be uploaded to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 该 data_bags/ 目录用来存储所有的数据包中存在的一个组织。每个子目录对应于Chef Infra Server上的单个数据包，并包含每个数据包项的JSON文件。如果不存在子目录，请使用SSL命令创建它。创建数据包项目后，可以将其上载到Chef Infra Server。

trans-unit.source: The data_bags/ directory is used to store all of the data bags that exist for an organization. Each sub-directory corresponds to a single data bag on the Chef server and contains a JSON file for each data bag item. If a sub-directory does not exist, then create it using SSL commands. After a data bag item is created, it can then be uploaded to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 该 data_bags/ 目录用来存储所有的数据包中存在的一个组织。每个子目录对应于Chef服务器上的单个数据包，并包含每个数据包项的JSON文件。如果子目录不存在，请使用SSL命令创建它。创建数据包项目后，可以将其上载到Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The data_bags directory can be placed under version source control.
trans-unit.target: 所述 data_bags 目录可以放置版本源控制之下。

trans-unit.source: The default.rb recipe in a project cookbook is executed by Chef Infra Client on infrastructure nodes as the project moves through the Chef Automate pipeline. The provision.rb recipe discovers all metadata.rb and/or metadata.json files in the project, including those under the /cookbooks directory.
trans-unit.target: 当项目通过Chef Automate管道时，Chef Infra Client在基础结构节点上执行项目食谱中的 default.rb 配方。该 provision.rb 食谱发现所有 metadata.rb 和/或 metadata.json 在项目文件，包括那些在 /cookbooks 目录。

trans-unit.source: The default.rb recipe is created when a cookbook is generated. A recipe is updated using a text editor. For example:

trans-unit.source: The default.rb recipes in all project cookbooks are executed by Chef Infra Client on infrastructure nodes as the project moves through the Chef Automate pipeline. The default.rb recipe in the build-cookbook is run first, and then each default.rb recipe in each cookbook under /cookbooks is run (in alphabetical order, by cookbook name).
trans-unit.target: 当项目在Chef Automate管道中移动时，Chef Infra Client在基础结构节点上执行所有项目食谱中的 default.rb 配方。首先运行 build-cookbook 中的 default.rb 配方，然后运行 /cookbooks 下每个食谱中的每个 default.rb 配方（按字母顺序，按食谱名称）。

trans-unit.source: The default_action method may also be used to specify the default action. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该 default_action 方法也可用于指定的默认操作。例如：

trans-unit.source: The default_zone property displays the default active zone to be used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 default_zone 属性显示默认有源区被使用。

trans-unit.source: The define_project_application helper method is available from the delivery-sugar cookbook, which is a dependency of the delivery-truck cookbook. This helper is available when the publish.rb recipe has include_recipe 'delivery-truck::publish' defined.
trans-unit.target: 该 define_project_application 辅助方法可从 delivery-sugar 食谱，这是一个依赖 delivery-truck 菜谱。当 publish.rb 配方定义了 include_recipe 'delivery-truck::publish' 时，此帮助程序可用。

trans-unit.source: The define_project_application helper method is available from the delivery-sugar cookbook, which is a dependency of the delivery-truck cookbook. This helper is available when the publish.rb recipe has include_recipe 'delivery-truck::publish' defined.
trans-unit.target: 该 define_project_application 辅助方法可从递送糖食谱，这是一个依赖递送货车菜谱。当publish.rb配方定义了 include_recipe 'delivery-truck::publish' 时，此帮助程序可用。

trans-unit.source: The delete-backups subcommand is used to delete Chef Automate backup archives and Elasticsearch snapshots. The command matches a given regular expression and prompts the user to confirm deletion of each matched backup or snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 该 delete-backups 子命令是用来删除厨师自动化备份存档Elasticsearch快照。该命令匹配给定的正则表达式，并提示用户确认删除每个匹配的备份或快照。

trans-unit.source: The delete-elasticsearch-lock subcommand is used to delete the exclusive Elasticsearch lock document that is used by several of Chef Automate’s services to coordinate major operations. Each service should create and remove this lock automatically, but in the event of an issue an operator can use this command to manually free the lock. The --stale-lock-only option (added in Chef Automate 1.8.3) ensures that a lock is only deleted if it is older than the currently running Elasticsearch process.
trans-unit.target: 该 delete-elasticsearch-lock 子命令是用来删除所使用的几个厨师自动化的服务，协调重大操作的排他性Elasticsearch锁文件。每个服务都应自动创建和删除此锁，但是如果出现问题，操作员可以使用此命令手动释放该锁。该 --stale-lock-only 选项可以确保，如果它比当前运行的进程Elasticsearch年纪大锁只删除（在厨师自动化1.8.3添加）。

trans-unit.source: The delete-enterprise subcommand is used to delete a Chef Automate enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 该 delete-enterprise 子命令用于删除一个厨师自动化企业。

trans-unit.source: The delete-node subcommand is used to delete a node and it’s corresponding history from Chef Automate. The user must provide some combination of the node’s UUID, name, organization name, and chef server FQDN to determine which node to delete. In the event that multiple nodes are found, a list of matching nodes will displayed. Narrow the search by providing more search parameters or use the UUID to delete the node.
trans-unit.target: 在 delete-node 子命令删除节点和它对应的历史从厨师自动化。用户必须提供节点的UUID，名称，组织名称和厨师服务器FQDN的某种组合，才能确定要删除的节点。如果找到多个节点，将显示匹配节点的列表。通过提供更多搜索参数来缩小搜索范围，或使用UUID删除节点。

trans-unit.source: The delete-project subcommand is used to delete a Chef Automate project.
trans-unit.target: 该 delete-project 的子命令用来删除一个厨师自动化项目。

trans-unit.source: The delete-runner subcommand deletes a remote node configured as a job runner, which was used by Chef Automate to run phase jobs. For more information on runners, please see the Runners documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 delete-runner 子命令删除配置为工作流道，其用于由厨师自动化运行阶段作业的远程节点。有关跑步者的更多信息，请参阅跑步者文档。

trans-unit.source: The delete-runner subcommand deletes a remote node configured as a job runner, which was used by Chef Automate to run phase jobs. For more information on runners, please see the Runners documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 delete-runner 子命令删除配置为工作流道，其用于由厨师自动化运行阶段作业的远程节点。有关跑步者的更多信息，请参阅跑步者文档。

trans-unit.source: The delete-user subcommand is used to delete a user.
trans-unit.target: 在 delete-user 子命令来删除用户。

trans-unit.source: The delivery-sugar cookbook exposes some libraries and a resource that you can use to publish a cookbook (or multiple cookbooks) to multiple Chef Infra Servers or organizations. The following examples show how to publish to both a single Chef Infra Server and how to extend that methodology to publish to multiple Chef Infra Servers.
trans-unit.target: 在 delivery-sugar 食谱暴露出一些图书馆和资源，你可以用它来发布菜谱（或多个食谱）到多个厨师红外服务器或组织。以下示例显示了如何同时发布到单个Chef Infra服务器以及如何扩展该方法以发布到多个Chef Infra服务器。

trans-unit.source: The delivery-sugar cookbook exposes some libraries and a resource that you can use to publish a cookbook (or multiple cookbooks) to multiple Chef servers or organizations. The following examples show how to publish to both a single Chef Infra Server and how to extend that methodology to publish to multiple Chef servers.
trans-unit.target: 在 delivery-sugar 食谱暴露出一些图书馆和资源，你可以用它来发布菜谱（或多个食谱）到多个厨师服务器或组织。以下示例显示如何发布到单个Chef Infra服务器，以及如何扩展该方法以发布到多个Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The delivery-truck cookbook has a dependency on the delivery-sugar cookbook, which contains a set of helper methods and custom resources that may be used in build cookbook recipes. Using these helper methods and custom resources in a build cookbook is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在 delivery-truck 食谱对依赖 delivery-sugar 食谱，其中包含了一组可在构建菜谱食谱中的辅助方法和自定义资源。在构建食谱中使用这些辅助方法和自定义资源是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The delivery-truck setting specifies configurations for specific phases of the Chef Automate pipeline:
trans-unit.target: 该 delivery-truck 设置的厨师自动化流水线的特定阶段指定配置：

trans-unit.source: The delivery.rb file, located at /etc/delivery/delivery.rb, contains all of the non-default configuration settings used by the Chef Automate. (The default settings are built-in to the Chef Automate configuration and should only be added to the delivery.rb file to apply non-default values.) These configuration settings are processed when the delivery-server-ctl reconfigure command is run, such as immediately after setting up Chef Automate or after making a change to the underlying configuration settings after the server has been deployed. The delivery.rb file is a Ruby file, which means that conditional statements can be used in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 位于 /etc/delivery/delivery.rb 的 delivery.rb 文件包含Chef Automate使用的所有非默认配置设置。 （默认设置内置于Chef Automate配置中，仅应将其添加到 delivery.rb 文件中以应用非默认值。）在运行 delivery-server-ctl reconfigure 命令时，将处理这些配置设置，例如设置Chef Automate之后或部署服务器后对基础配置设置进行更改后立即执行。该 delivery.rb 文件是一个Ruby文件，这就意味着条件语句可以在配置文件中使用。

trans-unit.source: The dependencies setting specifies run-time dependencies on which the current project depends. These dependency associations affect how projects are promoted through the Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered stages. Dependencies may be defined in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 该 dependencies 设置指定运行时在其当前项目所依赖的相关性。这些依存关系会影响如何通过联盟，排练和交付阶段来促进项目。依赖关系可以通过以下方式定义：

trans-unit.source: The deploy and deploy_revision resources have been deprecated as of Chef Client 13.6, and will be removed in Chef Client 14.
trans-unit.target: 从Chef Client 13.6开始，不推荐使用 deploy 和 deploy_revision 资源，并将在Chef Client 14中将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The deploy_revision provider is the recommended provider, even if it is not listed as the default. The deploy_revision provider is used to ensure that the name of a release sub-directory is based on a revision identifier. For users of git, this will be the familiar SHA checksum. For users of Subversion, it will be the integer revision number. If a name other than a revision identifier is provided—branch names, tags, and so on—the chef-client will ignore the alternate names and will look up the revision identifier and use it to name the release sub-directory. When the deploy_revision provider is given an exact revision to deploy, it will behave in an idempotent manner.
trans-unit.target: 即使未将其列为默认设置，也推荐使用 deploy_revision 提供程序。该 deploy_revision 提供用于确保释放子目录的名称是根据修订标识符。对于git的用户，这将是熟悉的SHA校验和。对于Subversion用户，它将是整数修订版本号。如果提供了除修订标识符之外的其他名称（分支名称，标签等），则厨师客户端将忽略备用名称，并查找修订标识符并将其用于命名发行子目录。当为 deploy_revision 提供程序提供要部署的确切修订版时，它将以幂等方式运行。

trans-unit.source: The deploy_revision provider results in deployed components under the destination location that is owned by the user who runs the application. This is sometimes an issue for certain workflows. If issues arise, consider the following:

trans-unit.source: The elasticsearch['urls'] attribute should be an array of Elasticsearch nodes over which Chef Automate will round-robin requests. You can also supply a single entry which corresponds to a load-balancer or a third-party Elasticsearch-as-a-service offering.

trans-unit.source: The file_version property tests if a Windows file’s version matches the specified value. The difference between a file’s “file version” and “product version” is that the file version is the version number of the file itself, whereas the product version is the version number associated with the application from which that file originates:
trans-unit.target: 该 file_version 性能测试如果Windows文件的版本指定的值相匹配。文件的“文件版本”和“产品版本”之间的区别在于，文件版本是文件本身的版本号，而产品版本是与该文件所源自的应用程序关联的版本号：

trans-unit.source: The filepath property can also be used.

trans-unit.source: The flush_cache property does not flush the local DNF cache! Use dnf tools—dnf clean metadata, dnf clean packages, dnf clean all—to clean the local DNF cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 flush_cache 属性不刷新本地缓存DNF！使用dnf工具 dnf clean metadata ， dnf clean packages ， dnf clean all -清理本地DNF缓存。

trans-unit.source: The flush_cache property does not flush the local Yum cache! Use Yum tools—yum clean headers, yum clean packages, yum clean all—to clean the local Yum cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 flush_cache 属性不刷新本地缓存百胜！使用Yum工具（ yum clean headers ， yum clean packages ， yum clean all )来清理本地Yum缓存。

trans-unit.source: The gather-logs command is used to collect the logs from Chef Automate into a compressed file archive. It will create a tbz2 file in the current working directory, with the timestamp as the file name.
trans-unit.target: 在 gather-logs 命令用于从厨师自动化日志收集到一个压缩文件归档。它将在当前工作目录中创建一个tbz2文件，并将时间戳作为文件名。

trans-unit.source: The gather-logs subcommand is used to gather the Chef Infra Server log files into a tarball that contains all of the important log files and system information.
trans-unit.target: 该 gather-logs 子命令厨师红外服务器日志文件收集到包含所有重要的日志文件和系统信息的压缩包。

trans-unit.source: The gecode solver matches the engine used by the Chef Infra Server, so will more closely reflect the behavior of the Chef Infra Server in selecting cookbooks:
trans-unit.target: 该 gecode 求解由厨师红外Server所使用的发动机相匹配，所以会更密切地反映了厨师红外服务器的选择食谱的行为：

trans-unit.source: The generate-password-reset-token command is used to unset the password for an existing Chef Automate user, and generate a token that allows them to set a new password. The command returns a URL pointing to the Chef Automate UI, allowing the user to enter a new password.
trans-unit.target: 的 generate-password-reset-token 命令用于为现有厨师自动化用户取消设置的密码，生成令牌，使他们能够设置新的密码。该命令返回指向Chef Automate UI的URL，从而允许用户输入新密码。

trans-unit.target: 该 groups_attr 设置是可选的，但如果没有提供，用户通过SAML验证将不会有任何球队的成员。

trans-unit.source: The guard_interpreter property is set to :default by default for the bash, csh, perl, python, and ruby resources. When the guard_interpreter property is set to :default, not_if or only_if guard statements do not inherit properties that are defined by the script-based resource.
trans-unit.target: 对于bash，csh，perl，python和ruby资源，默认将 guard_interpreter 属性设置为 :default 。当 guard_interpreter 属性设置为 :default 时， not_if 或 only_if 保护声明不继承基于脚本的资源定义的属性。

trans-unit.target: 该 ha-status 子命令用于为您在高可用性拓扑运行服务的状态。此命令将验证以下内容：

trans-unit.source: The hab config apply and hab file upload commands will work as usual when user/service group trust relationships are set up in this way.
trans-unit.target: 当以此方式设置用户/服务组信任关系时， hab config apply 和 hab file upload 命令将照常工作。

trans-unit.source: The hab pkg download command can be used to download individual packages (along with their dependencies and keys) from Builder, without installing them. This allows you to more easily transfer packages from one Builder instance to another, or to take a selective snapshot of particular packages.
trans-unit.target: 该 hab pkg download 命令可以用来下载单个包的生成器（与它们的依赖和钥匙一起），但不安装它们。这使您可以更轻松地将软件包从一个Builder实例转移到另一个Builder实例，或对特定软件包进行选择性快照。

trans-unit.source: The hab-origin subcommand will place the origin key files, originname-timestamp.sig.key (the private key) and originname-timestamp.pub files (the public key), in the $HOME/.hab/cache/keys directory. If you’re creating origin keys in the Studio container, or you are running as root on a Linux machine, your keys will be stored in /hab/cache/keys.
trans-unit.target: 该 hab-origin 子命令将会把起源密钥文件，originname-时间戳.sig.key（私钥）和originname-时间戳的.pub文件（公钥），在 $HOME/.hab/cache/keys 目录。如果要在Studio容器中创建原始密钥，或者在Linux计算机上以root身份运行，则密钥将存储在 /hab/cache/keys 中。
